lines.text: When the Jews return to Zion / And a comet rips the sky / And the Holy Roman Empire rises, / Then You and I must die. / From the eternal sea he rises, / Creating armies on either shore, / Turning man against his brother / 'Til man exists no more.
Look at me, Damien! It's all for you.
[she jumps off a roof, hanging herself]
Have no fear, little one... I am here to protect thee.
[last title card]
"Here is wisdom. Let him that hath understanding count the number of the beast; for it is the number of a man; and his number is 666." Book of Revelation Chapter 13 Verse 18
What do you know about my son?
Everything.
And what is that?
I saw its mother.
You saw my wife.
I saw its mother.
You are referring to my wife!
Its *mother*, Mr. Thorn!
If this is blackmail, come and say it! What is it you're trying to say?
Its mother was a Jack...
[Father Brennan is interrupted as the door behind him bursts open violently]
Everything all right, sir?
You sounded strange. The door was locked.
I *never* want to see you again.
...You'll see me in *hell*, Mr. Thorn. There, we will share out our sentence.

[Referring to Damien]
Look, I'm not just some bystander. I was the one that found him.
And I'm the one that's supposed to kill him.
[Revealing daggers from Bugenhagen]
These are knives. He wants me to stab him! He wants me to murder a child.
It's not a child.
How can he know that? Maybe he's wrong. It's insane. I won't have anything to do with murdering a little boy. He's not responsible. I won't do it!
[Tosses the knives away]
Well, if you won't do it... I will!
[first title card]
Rome / June 6th - 6 AM
Something in mind, Mr. Ambassador?
Why don't we have a little look upstairs...
Well, there's no furniture up there either.
Awww, you know, you could be too sexy for the White House!
If there were anything wrong, you'd tell me, wouldn't you?
Wrong? What could be wrong with our child, Robert? We're beautiful people, aren't we?
Please, Daddy! No, Daddy, no!
[first lines]

[voiceover]
The child is dead. He breathed for a moment. Then he breathed no more. The child is dead. Dead. The child is dead.
[last lines]
Excuse me, Mr. President. When you're ready to leave, your car's right over there.
In a moment.
Yes, sir.
He must DIE, Mr. Thorn!
[Robert Thorn and Kathy Thorn survey their mansion]
It's a bit much.
No, nothing's too much for the wife of the future President of the United States.
You know, you're pushy.
Run out of film?
Saving it for his canonization.
How's that?
I don't know if we've got the heir to the Thorn millions here or Jesus Christ Himself.
